data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre, Cai, Wanzhi, Karimi, Javad (2013): An annotated catalog of the Iranian Reduvioidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Cimicomorpha). Zootaxa 3718 (3): 201-238, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3718.3.1
